sense.gloss: flounder (esp. the large-tooth flounders of family Paralichthyidae, but also lefteye flounders of family Bothidae)
person who sucks up to superiors, toady
sole (any fish of the families Cynoglossidae and Soleidae)
halibut (esp. the Pacific halibut, Hippoglossus stenolepis)
